title: Riley Amos 7th for Historic US-Best in Men’s Olympic XC
content:
Christopher Blevins punctured early but dug deep to finish 13th in banner day for U23 star Amos: 'The emotions came out in the last lap.'

Read the full article at Riley Amos 7th for Historic US-Best in Men’s Olympic XC on Velo.
author: ahood
